long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use spacebar clicker to practice and increase your spacebar speed easily.

With Spacebar Clicker, gamers can now test their spacebar speed within the browser. Every gamer can install the extension and practice to increase how many times they press the spacebar.

Using Spacebar Clicker / Counter

1. Install the extension, click on the extension icon to open the spacebar clicker popup.
2. Press the Spacebar button to start the spacebar counter. 
3. Every time you press the spacebar, the counter on the screen increases.
4. Hit the red 'Restart' button to start the spacebar counter again from zero.

Note: You can also play new Spacebar Games to practice your spacebar clicking. Press the button below the box to start playing spacebar games.
